segments.text: Hello . Are you here to withdraw some money from your account at the Securities Company ? I'll need to see your Passbook for that account .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . OK ... your balance is 320,214 RIB . How much do you require today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please fill in this transfer form and enter your password , here . Then the transaction should be completed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK ... there we go . Thanks very much .
segments.speaker: S2
